name: Leroy N. BERRY, Lawrence H. Duppins, William J. Malizia, Jr., Aaron J. Stanford on Behalf of Themselves and All Others Similarly Situated, Petitioners v. CITY OF PHILADELPHIA, Respondent

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 26th day of October, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM
